| Matter contacts and calendars i

Typically, an existing contact must have a specific role to be associated with a
matter

+ For example, only contacts with the role of attorney can be the plaintiff attorney
Contacts will be created with a given role

+ For example, a new contact created from the Plaintiff Attorney field will automatically be given the role
of attorney

Matter-related activities are added to the matter calendar
You can view matter-related activities across all claims

The Matter Calendar is separate from the Claim Calendar

| Plan of action: evaluations i

* Suppose that there is a dispute about who was at fault on a claim
¢ The insurer creates a “plan of action” to track the financial expectation and
resolution of the dispute
* Tracks the expected claim liabilities
* Helps evaluate a claim’s possible, expected, and worst-case cost scenarios
* Tracks both actual claim costs and possible punitive damage costs

* Is a worksheet to calculate value for low, high, and likely settlement

+ Insured liability % of (economic damages + punitive damages)

* Base configuration does not tie the evaluation worksheet to Financials

History of the offers and counter-offers related to one disputed aspect of the loss
Records how you will discuss with claimant or representatives

Tracks overall
+ Liability assessment

+ Andsoon

Negotiation lines keep track of detail negotiations
+ Date
+ Type (offer, counter-offer, accepted offer)
+ Amount
+ Notes

| Claims under special investigation fa

¢ The claim supervisor may refer the claim to special investigation

¢« When a claim is under investigation:
+ Claims processing typically continues as normal

+ ClaimCenter can have built-in rules to prevent a claim from being paid if it is under investigation

¢ Ifaclaim is determined to be fraudulent, the insurer may:
+ Take legal action against the claimant
+ Seek remuneration from the claimant if payments have already been made

* Cancel the claimant's policy or indicate that the policy should not be renewed at the end of its current
term (if the claimant is also the insured)

+ Note the claimant's name for possible future fraud activity
